sections.title: What is Programming?
sections.content:
Programming is the process of creating a set of instructions that tell a computer how to perform a task.

It can be done using a variety of computer programming languages, such as Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, etc.

sections.title: Why Learn Programming?
sections.content: Learning to program can open up a world of opportunities. It helps in developing problem-solving skills, logical thinking, and creativity.
